1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nA ma saM gI ti maN+Da la bi d+hi A kA sha 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): bi ma la nA ma/ bod skad du/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 
1b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor cho ga nam mkha'i dri med ces bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
1b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum ba de gshegs shes rab 
1b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo can// ma rig mun nang sems nan nyi ma thag la// ye shes 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi zer sbyin mdzad thugs rje'i bdag/ 'jam dpal de la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul rgya chen nam mkha' lta bu nas// dbugs dbyung drug bsdus zab pa yang dag ni// dkyil 'khor cha 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): gi dge ba 'di phyogs tsam// bsdus la mos pa'i don du bshad par bya// de la 'dir rdo rje rlob dpon sdom pa
2a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan zhing dbang thob pa gzhan la phan pa'i blo can zhig gis/ nyon mongs pa rags pa'i gang zag la ma smin pa 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): smin par bya ba'am/ sems can thams cad bde ba la dgod par bya ba'i phyir / sangs rgyas thams cad 
2a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par bya ste/ gza' dang nyi ma dang skar ma bzang po la/ mkho ba'i yo byad ci 'byor pa bsogs la/ 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): nags tshal lam/ ri bo 'am/ chu klung ngam/ tshang tshing la sogs pa nyams dga' ba'i gnas su gnas par byas la stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang gi sgo dag par byas nas mos pa'i slob ma ma rungs pa 'dul
2b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyal por gnas par bya ste/ hUM gi mtshan ma las byung ba'i khro bo'i gshin rje gshed du skad cig gis bdag nyid gyur te/ sku mdog mthing na ga ha la pa/ zhal brgya ljags 'dril zhing ha ha hi hi'i gad rgyangs
2b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur sgrog pa/ spyan mig dmar po rdo rje'i mig can/ lag pa brgya po kun bskyod mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ gom pa'i stabs kyis gdug pa mnan pa/ thod pa dang sbrul dang stag lpags 
2b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa/ zhing chen dang glang chen gyi ko rlon gyon pa/ gshin rje gshed po bgegs thams cad kyi rgyal por bskyed la/ mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil gyi rdo rje sngon po mig 'bras su 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ khro bo'i sdang mig g.yon nas skor bas bgegs thams cad skrag par bya'o// g.yas nas skor bas rdo rje ra ba'o// 'og tu bltas pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'o// steng du bltas pas rdo rje'i 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): bur du bya'o// de'i rjes la gnas der phyag dar dang skyang nul bya zhing / a ka ru nag pos kyang phyogs bcur bdugs la sa gzhi tsan dan la sogs pa'i dris byugs te/ de'i dbus su maN+Dal khru 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): gang ba gsum bya ste/ sa de la rin po che brdar zhing 'thas par byas la/ rdo rgyus kyis dkar por bya zhing 'o ma dang tsan dan dang gur kum la sogs pa srog chags la gnod pa ma byas pa las byung ba'i dris
2b8(rgyud 'grel): byugs la/ yi ge sA las byung ba'i rin po che bkram pa ni/ bla ma'i maN+Dal ri rab gling bzhis brgyan pa bkod la/ rang nyid dkon mchog gsum la rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog tshom bu dgod pa dang / 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): yi dam lha'i maN+Dal gyi dkyil 'khor la grangs dang mnyam pa'i me tog gi tshom bu bkod la/ rang nyid yid ma lha'i nga rgyal gyi snying kha nas sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis gtsug tor 'khor los bskur ba bkug
3a2(rgyud 'grel): la maN+Dal la bcug ste/ bzhugs pa'i rten dang / mkho ba'i yon du byin gyis brlab po// de'i rjes la mchod pa lnga dang / yan lag gis mchod pa g.yas dang g.yon du bkram la/ gtsang zhing dag par 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): bshams te/ tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la gzhag par bya'o// de nas tshogs bsags pa'i yul dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mdun du mngon par sprul te maN+Dal phul la mchod par bya'o// 'jam 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje la sogs pa// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la// lus dang ngag yi dgus ldan nas// kun nas bdud de phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zhing du gang bsngags dang // 'jig rten dag pa mchog gyur pa'i// 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen me tog bdug spos sogs// kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi// bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig/ kun nas bsags par gang gyur la// rang bzhin med dang yod tshul gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): spyan sngar bshags// 'gro ba gang gis bsod nams gang // dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la// de bzhin mthun pa'i lhag sems kyis// dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo // bde gshegs byang chub mchog
3a7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas// 'gro ba thugs rjes gdul slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la// tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs// yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed la// 'gro kun yun du bde ba'i phyir// ji srid 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba de srid du// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol// ji srid 'khor ba gnas par du// bdag gi dge ba de bzhin du// kun nas zad par ma gyur par// sems can yongs su smin par shog/ 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung // byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// 'grol pha na phyir sangs rgyas shog/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): du ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// ding nas brtsams te gzung 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang // rdo rje slob dpon dam pa dag/ yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du dus drug du// sbyin pa rnams ni rab tu sbyin// pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la// sangs rgyas rnal nas gsungs pa yi// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang ci nus bzung // las kyi 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog chen po la// mchod pa'i las rnams bya ba dang // sdom pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa// shin tu dam pa bdag gis gzung // de ltar sdom pa ma lus pa// dam pa bdag gis gzung bgyis nas// byang chub 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog sems bskyed bgyis nas// sems can ma rigs ldongs pa rnams// bdag gis yang dag dgel gzung // sems can nyon mongs bcings pa yi// ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi// sems can 'khor 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgya mtsho las// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi// sdug bsngal chen po'i nang sems can// dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing // 'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi// sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// dus 'di 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): / nas ni bzung nas su// byang chub snying po mchis kyi bar// 'jam mgon 'bangs su bdag 'bul lags// thugs rjes yongs su bzung bar mdzod// dus ni nas ni bzung nas su// bder gshegs 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): byed kyi bka bzhid du// sems can don du bsgrub lags kyis// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// de ltar bsngod rnams kyi tshogs bsags pas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): chang byed pa pa'i rjes su dran nas/ sems bgyid cing sgom pa bzung ngas/ dani la shes kyi tshigs yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'drin pasgom bstod pa nyid latho gtad la/ de sgrub par byed pa'i tshig brjod pa sgra'i don la mos 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ga pa ma mal ma// ram sa/ / rna 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gis 'akrus pa'i chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med par gyur te ye shes kyisas spangs nas/ chos thams can nam mapa'i dkyil 'khrur rang gi sems kyi sdung ba shar ba las mA'i dang / shA li'i phreng ba bams sa 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): ma las ni bid+ma dkar pa'i steng / kA li las chos kyi 'byung gnas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam ga/ do mam 'od byer gyi phreng ba las bskor ba'i nang du/ 'od zer gyi phreng bka 'bros shing 'dus pa las/ 'od sdang bul sa rlu 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'a rini rgyamamagyis mchan pa/ 'dang mang dril ba ma'i dkyi 'chang ba ma pos cha' pa/ 'dang / grolas na'i kyil lab ngan thoms mtshan pa / 'daser polas gseng byas pani la rims pa rnaMg 
4a8(rgyud 'grel): thalas rdza la dag de sa gang gags bcwan dub bar ma drug byang me ngas na pag/ de cid byen kyi kyi tho mas kyi 'du ga las nga grub na pa la no ba'i paso thung be 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): Tas mdzes par brgyan pa/ phyi rol na mu tig gi zar tshags dang dril bu g.yer kha grwa bzhi nas 'phyang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi chun 'apyad kyang rta babs kyi ka ba la 'phyang ba/ rta babs kyang tA ra Na la sogs pas 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cing / ri dgas dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang / 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang rin po che 'od du 'bar ba'i tog gis mdzes par byas te/ gzhal yas khang gi nang du/ seng ge dang glang po che dang 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): rtamachog dang / rma bya dang nam mkha' lding gi steng du pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i gdan mdzes par bkram pa dang / 'khor rnams kyang go rims su pad+ma dang / zla ba'i gdan bkram par bsams la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gdan thog du rang 
4b4(rgyud 'grel): gi sems kyi cho 'phrul las A li kA li'i phreng ba byung ba las/ de'i spro bsdu'i byin rlabs las zla ba dang nyi ma la de dang des mtshan par gyur/ de'i nang du a las byung ba'i rdo rje dkar po as mtshan par gyur/ de rnams spro zhing
4b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas 'od 'bar ba las/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po zhal bzhi pa zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa/ gnyis pa lho// gsum pa rub/ bzhi pa byang ngo // phyogs bzhi ga na phyag gnyis gnyis 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'i steng na rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa skyes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de'i thugs kar yi ge d+hIHlas/ dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas bzhin shes rab kyi ral gri/ 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti yod pa/ zhal ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa/ dbus dmar ser ro// de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa la/ gsang sngags rgyal po drug gis mtshan pa/ de'i 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil du 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas ral gri g.yon po ti 'dzin pa/ de'i steng du zla ba dang / a bsgom par bya'o// de ltar na de ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin no// 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo drug bskyed par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'di a las spro bar bya'o// a A i I u U e ai o au aM aHhrIH 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): dridzi di dz+nyA na mUrti ra ha/ bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAn/ t+yad+hA ba ra tI nAM/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sha ya te na maHoM duHkhats+tshe da ya te na maHoM pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mU ra ta ye yi ti na maH/ oM dz+nyA na kA yA ya te na maH/ oM bA gI shwa rA ya te na maH/ oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te ra maH/ 
5a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA b+hA ba/ swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha/ tsak+Shu badz+ra/ a A aM aHpa gr-i ti/ ba ri shud+ha/ sarba d+har+m+ma ya du te/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shI/ pa ri shud+d+hi tA/ mu pA dA ye ti/ oM a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / oM hUM hriHb+ha ga ban/ dA na mUr ti/ bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ zhes brjod pas yi ge'i phreng ba de rnams 'od zer dang bcas nas dkyil 
5a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi sgo bzhinas par 'phros pas/ rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i zhing khams su sangs rgyas mchod nas/ slar 'od zer du 'dus te dkyil 'khor gyi skon tshur 'dus pa las/ gdan rnams kyi steng du yi ge a 'ba' zhig tu 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa de gnas pa las/ de rnams las byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma las sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ ma gnon gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa'o// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po g.yas rdo rje thugs kar bstod pa/ g.yon dril bu dku la gtad pa'o// g.yas ngos su rdo rje rgyal po mdog ser po// tho ba thogs pa'o// rgyab tu rdo rje chags
5a8(rgyud 'grel): pa dmar po mda' 'gengs pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje legs pa ljang gu rdo rje 'dzin pa/ se gol gyi legs pa ster ba'o// lho phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la/ sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ mchod/ 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin rin po che bsdams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// mdun du rdo rje rin chen ser po g.yas rin po che rdo rje dpral bar bstod pa g.yon dril bu dkur brten pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma sngon po nyi ma 'dzin pa'o// rgyab tu 
5b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbang po dmar po rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po so shing gi phreng ba thogs pa'o// nub phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gzhag gi thog na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// mdun du rdo rje chos dmar po pad+ma'i sdong bu snying gar kha phye ba 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje rnon po sngon po ral gri thogs pa'o// rgyab tu
5b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgyu ser po 'khor lo can no// g.yon du rdo rje smra ba sngon po lce thogs pa'o// byang phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la sangs rgyas don yod grub pa ljang dgu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa skyabs sbyin mdzad cing rgya gram can rgyan thams cad 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa'o// mdun du rdo rje las ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje srung bsar po rdo rje khrab thogs pa'o// rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po mche ba thogs pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ser po rdo rje 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa'o// de nas gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin chen sems dpa' dang / pad+ma sems dpa' dang / las kyi sems dpa' dang / rigs bzhi'i sems dpa' bsgom mo// de'i phyi rol 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhin sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin pa dang / phreng ba ma ser mo// rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang / glum sngon mo bi bang 'dzin pa dang / gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin pa dang / de rnams shar lho nas brtsams te bsgom mo// 
5b8(rgyud 'grel): gru chad bzhi la spos me ma dkar mo spos phor thogs pa dang / me tog ma mthing ga me tog 'dzin pa dang / mang me ma dmar mo mar me thogs pa dang / dri chab ma ljang gu dri'i lde gu thogs pa dang / de rnams kyang shar lho mtshams 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): ra pas 'a sa sa sa pa sa sa sa sa sa ma pa nga pa ma sam bas pa mams pas yang 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): nas rim bzhin no// de'i phyi rol gyi khyams rdabs su byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song kun 'drer dang / mya ngan kun 'joms rnams ni mdog dkar po rdo rje thogs pa rnams ni shar 
6a3(rgyud 'grel): du'o// spos kyi blo gros dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzad dang / ye shes rtog dang / de rnams ni mdog ser po rin po che'i ske ma thogs pa rnams ni lho ru'o// 'od dpag med dang zla ba'i 'od dang / bzang 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): skyong dang / dra ba car gyi 'od rnams ni mdog dmar po pad+ma'i sdong bu thogs pa rnams ni rub du'o// rdo rje snying po dang blo gros pa zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kun tu bzang po rnams ni mdog ljang gu rgya gra pa 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa byang du'o// byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyar thams cad kyis brgyar pa'o// shar gyi sgor ni rdo rje lcags su sngon po lcags kyu thogs pa'o// lha'i sgor ni rdo rje zhags pa ser 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): pozhags pa thogs pa'o// nub kyi sgor lugs sgrog dmar po lcags sgrog thogs pa'o// byang gi sgor rdo rje 'bebase pa ljang nag dril bu thogs pa'o// sgo ba de rnams kyang cung zad khro ba/ zhal mche ba lhag ge brgyan
6a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor drug par kun tu bsgrims pa la mchod pa'i lta ba dang bsal bzang cha mthun pa'i 'khor la dbus kyi rnam snang chen po'i dkyil 'khor la rnam snang dang byang chub sems dpa' 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhes pa gnas pa'i tshul la// de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes kyi 'khor gyi lha tshogs par snang la bsdus pa spyar drang bya ba ste/ oM a A sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIH/ b+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na 
6a9(rgyud 'grel): mUd ti bA gI shwa ra/ mahA pa tsa sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na a ma la su ba ri shud+d+ha/ d+har+b+ba d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHmaN+Dal/ badz+ra sa ma ya dzaHzhes lan gsum brjod cing / sngags mjug badz+ra dri sh+ya zhes bya bas ye shes kyi 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): sa mangs ma las pa ka ya ma ba nga la dra sa nga gra ba 'a nga drasas ba sa yag ga nga nga ba sa ma nga ba ma ma ma sa pa sa sa sa ma sa 'a' ma ya yang da ma 
6b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor legs par blta bar bya'o// de'i rjes la phyag btsal te/ sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod de/ yid kyis sgo phye la dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod cing sgo bzhi nas tshur spyan drang la/ bgegs
6b3(rgyud 'grel): bskrad la yid kyis sgo bcad la/ rdo rje'i go chas gsungs la lha so so la bstim la dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi yum bzhin nam mkha' la bsdu bar bya'o// ye shes kyi bdud rtsis dbang 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur te dbang rtags spyi bor mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ni shar du bstan par bsgoms la bdag nyid lus gnyis kyi tshul du gzung ste/ lha snam la gnas te rdzas kyis 
6b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga phul la sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod de// rdo rje sems pas bsdus pas na// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa// rdo rje las kun mdzad pa'o// oM badz+ra satwa su saM gra ha zhes/ 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags dang gar dang glu dang bcas pas dbul lo// byang chub yan lag me tog spos// mar me snang ba byug pa dri// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra d+hU pe d+hA/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe bu/ oM badz+ra A lo ge hrIHoM badz+ra gan+d+he gan zhes pas mchod do// gzhan yang gsang ba'i yum bzhi pa mchod de// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa thams cad sel// 
6b9(rgyud 'grel): bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// satwa badz+ra hUM/ rat+na badz+ra hUM/ d+har+m+ma badz+ra hUM/ zhes mchod la bstod de/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud ces pa nas// ye shes su nyid khyod la 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// ces pa'i bar gyis bstod pa'i rgyal po des bstod la/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo la sems gtad pa'i yid kyis gsang sngags rgyal po 'di drug bzlas par bya'o// oM badz+ra tIk+Sha duHkha ts+tshed
7a2(rgyud 'grel): prad+yA d+hA na mUr+ha ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ bA g+he shwa ra a ra pa tsa rA ya te na maHzhes bzlas par bya'o// de ltar lnga bskyed cing gsol ba btab la gnas pa de dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan te// 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod la 'gro ba'i don du phrin las la sbyar te/ dkyil 'khor chen po drug 'jig rten du spro ste/ 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs bskye nas nyon mongs pa drug sbyangs 'gro ba drug dbugs phyung dkyil 'khor drag gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas slar snga ma nyid la bsdu zhing spros nas 'gro ba'i don bya'o// 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): de tsam gyis ni las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de lta bu'i cho ga rdzogs nas mchod cing bstod de lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bshags nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsdu zhing chos thams cad 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid du rgyas gdab cing bde ba'i spyod pa bya'o// de lta bu'i sbyor bas mtshan ma brtan po byung ba de srid kyi bar du bya ste/ de yang sems rtse gcig tu bsgom zhing zlos pa de la ni dus gsum gyi sangs
7a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te gshegs nas chos kyi sgo thams cad ston par mdzad de sku yang ston to zhes gsungs pas/ zhal mthong ba'am rmi lam du lung bstan pa la sogs pa ma 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): bung gi bar du bde bar gshegs pa rnams bsnyen pa ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// de ltar bsnyen pa'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gnang ba thob nas gzhan gyi don du dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ ri dang rwa krung 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): dang nags tshal la sogs pa'i gnas su slob dpon la slob mas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i go skabs phye ste/ dang po sa'i cho gar yang de bzhin 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): du mnyam pa yin na dbus ma tho byang shar gzhol te dma' ba/ sa gzhi 'jam pa nyams dga' ba'i gnas su ngam grog dang bya skyibs dang / bong bu la sogs pa med pa 'jam zhing lhan sdug pa der dkyil 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor brtsig pa'am bri ba'i don dus ri bdag po la gnang ba thob par byas la/ sa'i lha mo la gtor ma phul la/ dngos grub rab 'bring thob pas brkos nas ltas brtags la mi shis pa yin na bar chad 'byung 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): bas dor bar bya'o// shis pa yin na de'i phyogs thams cad byi dor bya ste spos chus chag chag btab la shin tu ba lang gi lcibs byugs la 'thas par bcags te mnyam pa me long gi ngos ltar byas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas sa la 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): gtugs te/ oM badz+ra me di ni badz+rI b+ha ba ma hA badz+ra hUM zhes pas rdo rje'i sa bzhir byin gyis brlab po// de'i phyogs kun kyang a ka ru nag pos gtul zhing du bas bdug go// de ltar na lhag par gnas pa'i yan lag sa'i cho ga bstan
7b6(rgyud 'grel): to// de nas dkyil 'khor brtsi gsal/ srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du 'gro bas tshogs bsags la/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par bsgom ste/ mchod pa rgyas par phul nas bzlas pa bya ste/ mchod pa'am bstod pa'i rgyal 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): pos bltos la/ de nas bdun du brtul bya ste/ me tog bkram nas sa'i lha mo la mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa bshams te gtor ma yang bshams nas dam tshig gis phyag rgya bstan te/ 'di skad bsgo'o// 
7b8(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par bgyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// ji ltar shAkya seng ge yis// bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar// 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde// pham par byas te dkyil 'khor 'bri ces brjod de/ mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma phul la ye shes pa gshegs su gsol lo// de nas
8a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i grogs pos bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod la/ slob dpon gyis phur bu bcug shin rje gshed du bskyed la/ dar gyi cod pan dbang bskur la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT ces gzi brjid bskyed la 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go/ de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi snying gar bcug la langs te/ rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol la/ 'di skad ces bsgo'o// hUM ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / 
8a4(rgyud 'grel): sku'i cha byad za byed rngam pa'i stabs// gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong lding ba yis// bgegs gsum dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro bo'i 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// nyi zla 'bar ba'i sdang mig gis// bgegs kun bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM rang bzhin rnam dag dbyings las thugs rje chen por sprul/ 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): skye med ngang las 'jigs byed chen po'i sku bstan te// gdug pa 'dul phyir thugs dam mi 'gyur zhing // khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i// 
8a7(rgyud 'grel): lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig/ gnas 'dir bde gshegs dkyil 'khor pho brang 'bri// bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin byer bar gyis// gal te nga'i bsgo ba las 'das nas// ye shes 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): can gyi rdo rje rab 'bar bas// mgo bo tshal pa brgyar ni 'gas 'gyur zhing // rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// he sa phyogs bgegs gnas che ge mo 'di ru/ bdag rdo rje slob dpon che ge ma 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas/ slob ma che ge mo zhes bya bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bde ba la dgod par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i
8b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs thams cad bsdus pa zhig 'dri bas/ dus di ring bgegs kyi tshogs su gyur pa lha'i gdon dang klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding rgan po dang rgan mo 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa thams cad dengs shig/ byer zhig song zhig/ gang mi 'gro ba de ni rdo rje ye shes rab tu 'bar ba 'dis/ mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par gyur te re/ rdo rje hUM ste hUM hUM hUM zhes pa dang 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA nan sarba bi g+h+nAn u ts+tsha Ta ya hUM phaT ces bgegs bsrad do// spyan mig bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis kyang bsreg par bya'o// khro bo'i stang stobs gom pa'i 
8b5(rgyud 'grel): stabs kyis gar byed pas kyang bgegs ba srad par bya'o// de bzhin rdo rje 'gros kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tha ma lan gsum bskor bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i sa bzhi dang / rab dang gur dang / dra ba 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams byas la phur bus btab la bzhag go/ de nas can dan dang ba'i rnam lngas dkyil 'khor byugs la/ lha rnams kyi rten dri'i thig le dang / me tog gi tshom bu rnams bkod la/ rnam snang gi nga 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dang ldan pa'i snying gnas dkyil 'khor bton la 'dun du dgod par bya'o// de rnams la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod la gzhug
8b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir lha mo bzhis bsdus la dbang bskur te/ rgyas btab la mchod pa byas te/ bsgom bzlas brtsam mo// de ltar rdzogs pa dang mchod pa dang bstod pa
9a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par byas la/ snyan gas na dbab pa ni/ rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can dag 'di zhes pas// nang par dkyil 'khor bzang po'i mtshan// 'di zhes bya ba 'bri lags na// rjes su brtse ba nyer dgongs nas// kun gyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol// lha lhag par gnas pa'o// 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas bum pa bzang po nag nog med pa'i tshul dang mthun pa lha grangs dang mnyam pa 'am/ yang na bum pa bdun gu gul gyis bdug cing / bgegs bskrad cing bsangs te/ dri'i thig le dang mtshan ma bkod 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ rin po che lnga dang / sman lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang / snying po lnga dang / spos lnga dang / ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma dang / srog chags med pa'i chus bkang la/ ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul bcings te 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu can gyi shing gis kha brgyan la bzhag ste/ nang du lha thams cad bskyed pa dang / las thams cad par gshin rje gshed po bskyed cing ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod cing dbang bskur 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): la phreng sngags dang gsang sngags rgyal po drug bzlas la bzhag go/ bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas sgrub pa po'i g.yas ngos su gzhung dang mthun pa'i thab khung byas la/ las dang mthun 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shing dang rdzas bsags te/ me lha sngon du mchod la de'i snying gar dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs mchod rdzas phul la/ thun meng du mchod nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sngar gyi gnas/ 
9a8(rgyud 'grel): su gshegs te/ brtan par byas la/ sngar me lha la rdzas lhag mas mchod/ 'dod pa'i don gsol po btab nas me lha gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// de nas ci 'byor pa'i gtor mas chos skyong rnams la 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): tshim par byas la/ 'dod pa'i don la phrin las bcol la slar gnas su btang ngo // gtor ma dang sbyin sreg lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas snod du rung ba'i slob mas maN+Dal byas la/ me tog bkram nas 
9b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog gis snyim pa bkang nas// slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya ste// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ mgon 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i 
9b4(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer du// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal zhes brjod do// slob dpon gyis de la 'di skad ces bsgo ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gang du ma byon dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i bde 
9b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs kyis// de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas// dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med nyid// gsang sngags spyod pa bla med de// 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu'i blo gros 'di kyis shig ces brjod do// de nas 
9b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa kun bya ba dang / sems bskyed cing sdom pa srung du bcug la/ yi dam gang 'dod lhar bskyed la byin gyis brlab ste/ mchod pa lngas mchod la/ so shing 
9b8(rgyud 'grel): dor ba dang / srung skud bcing ba dang / byams pa'i go cha bskon la/ dbu'i gtsug tor bskyed de/ rmi lam brtag pa'i phyir ku sha byin la/ zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad la/ slob dpon gyis las 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams rdzogs par bya'o// slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus te/ go bskon te bsrungs te ci bder gnas par bya'o// de nas nang par nyi ma 'char khar 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ ba'i rnam lngas dkyil 'khor byugs te/ tsan dan gyi lde gu dri dang ldan par byas la/ thig skud sar pa nyis 'gyur tshad sgo'i nyi shu cha kha dog lnga pa rin po che'i
10a3(rgyud 'grel): snod du bcug la/ byin gyis brlabs la mchod la/ sna slob ma'i lag tu gtad la bsgril nas/ 'jig rten khams 'di ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro mgon gyi// khyed kyi dus ni 'di 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): lags kyis// bcom ldan rdo rje'i thig gdab gsol zhes brjod la/ bdag dang slob ma g.yas nas skor bas thig gdab par bya'o// tshangs thig dang po shar nas nub du gdab/ gnyis pa 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): byang nas lho ru gdab/ slob dpon me lhar gnas slob ma dbang ldan du gnas te/ shar gyi thig dang de bzhin du log gsum du gdab/ de rjes tshangs thig dang / zur thig dang thig chen dang / thig 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): phran gyi bye brag gis man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi gling ngam lngar thig gdab po// de yang steng du ye shes kyi thig dang / 'og tu dam tshig gi thig ste/ sa thig rlan gyis spangs la tshul ji 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): lta ba bzhin du mkhas pas dpyad la gdab par bya'o// de'i rjes la gser las byas pa'i rin po che lnga'i phye ma ji ltar byin gyis brlabs la/ mchod pa phul la bstims te/ tshon dgye ba ni dkar po chos
10a8(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ sngon po me long lta bu'i ye shes nyid// ser po so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la// dmar po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid// ljang gu bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// ye shes 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga ldan dkyil 'khor 'grub ces brjod la/ sngon la slob dpon gyis byang shar mtshams kyi rtsig pa brtsigasal phyi nas slob mas skor phyogs ma log pa'i ci bde bar tshon dgye bar bya'o// de la dang po gtso 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i gnas rnams ni/ nyi ma'i 'od la zla bas brgyan pa'o// gzhan dag ni phyogs kyi kha dog go// 'dod yon pad+ma rA ga'i sa gzhi/ rin chen pha gu gser las byas pa la/ rin po che'i phreng ba bkye ba la/ 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): dra ba dra phyed nam mkha'i mdog can mu tig gi har 'phyang ba de'i phyi rol du nam mkha'i mdog la ka ba dang rta babs dang ri dgas dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / gdugs dang / rgyan rnams ci mdzes
10b4(rgyud 'grel): par bri bar bya'o// de dag gi rgyab tu rdo rje dang / me 'od kyi phreng ba bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor lnga'i bar bar ni/ gser gyi sa gzhi la rin po che gcal du bkram par bya'o// de'i phyi rol gru bzhir byas la gra bzhi 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): la dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bris zin nas/ lhag pa dang chad pa bskang ba'i phyir dril bu dkrol zhing yi ge brgya pa bzlas la/ tha ma 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum bskor bar bya'o// de nas dpal dang 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byas la/ mchod pa'i bye brag me tog gi snod dang / spos phor dang dri'i snod dang mar me'i phreng ba dang / zhal zas kyi snod stong ngam
10b7(rgyud 'grel): brgya 'am bcu la sogs pa ci 'byor pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa ci 'byor pa bsags nas/ slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi shar du stan bde ba la gnas te/ cod pan la sogs 
10b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyan thams cad bsogs te/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis lhag par gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor snying ga nas sprul nas/ rdul tshon gyi 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang bsres nas tshogs bsags pa sngon du 'gro bas srung ba'i 'khor lo'i skabs su phur pa dang / mda' dang ral gri la sogs pa'i rabs bskor te/ sngon du gsungs 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul du rgyas par bsgoms nas mchod de/ bum pa yang bkod la dbang bskur zhing rgyas btab la/ rdzas kyi mchod pa lnga dang / phyi nang gi mchod pa lnga dang / gsang ba'i yum bzhis kyang legs 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): par mchod la/ gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rol mo'i bye brag thams cad kyang dbul bar bya ste/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' chen rol mo chen po ste// bkur sti rim gro 
11a4(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs// mchog tu dga' ba grags pa'i dpal// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phreng sngags dang / oM dang hUM bzlas 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ lha re re zhing re re dbul bar bya'o// bsam gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho 'di/ 
11a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul// bdug pa'i snod du ma dang / me tog gi snod du ma dang / byug pa'i snod du ma dang / mar me'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas so so'i sngags dang / gar dang
11a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dbul lo// yid bzhin nor bu chen po dang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa dang // bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams
11a8(rgyud 'grel): la 'bul// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// oM dang hUM bzlas te/ so so'i ming spel te/ oM rat+na ye hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas rin po che dang nor bu'i bye brag mang po dang / dpag bsam gyi 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): shing la sogs pa mang po dang / bum pa bzang po 'bras bu can gyi shing gis brgyan pa la sogs pa rin po che'i bye brag thams cad kyang lha re re zhing dbul lo// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing // nad do/ 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): cog gi dgra che ba// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gzigs pa yi// zug rngu 'byin pa blan med// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul// 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol// oM dz+hai nas zlos shing 'bras bu 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang / tsan dan dang / gur kum dang / ga bur dang / dzA ti la sogs pa srog chags las ma byung ba'i sman ji snyed yod pa de rnams lha re re zhing so so'i ming dang spel la dbul bar bya'o// phyogs bcu 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i mtha' thug pa'i// chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa dang // khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid 'di// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul// 'gro ba'i don du 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol// zhes brjod cing / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / 'phan dang gdugs la sogs pa ras sam 'phan gyi lda ldi bsam gyis mi khyab pa lha re re zhing dbul lo// lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing // 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul// 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol// zhes brjod cing // 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi rnam pa glog ltar bskur cing gzugs brgya stong du ma snyed du sprul la/ gar byed cing dkyil 'khor la dbul lo// de'i rjes la sbyin sreg gi cho gas mchod cing / mchod pas kyang lha tshogs mnyes
11b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya bar gsungs so// de nas dkyil 'khor la gnang ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste/ sngar sdom pa blangs pa'i slob ma des slob dpon la gsol ba btab nas/ 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma de la bgegs bskrad nas/ a ga ru nag pos bdugs la/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha b+h+rUM/ zhes pa'i don bzlas pa'i stod g.yogs dang / oM badz+ra lak+Sha hUM zhes bzlas pas gdong 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): ba bkab la/ sgo bzhi'i phyogs nas rigs lnga la phyag 'tshal du gzhug go/ de'i rjes la lag ra me tog thogs pa'i slob mas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas rgyun bshags bya'o// de nas 
12a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon la gsol ba 'di skad gdab par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa'i grong khyer mchog/ 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor 'di 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): drini// slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// zhes brjod par bya'o// slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces bya'o// bde bar gshegs pa byams cad kyi// gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pas// gsang 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su 'dzin pa ni// bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam// des kyang 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bya'o// de la slob dpon gyis rigs lnga'i sdom pa rig pa'i dbang lnga'i rten du rung bar bya ba'i phyir phog la 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang mi dge ba bcu dang / nye ba'i las kyang spang ba'i sdom pa sbyin no// des kyang slob dpon gyis sdom pa gsungs pa ltar/ kho bo yang bsrung zhing sdom par bgyid do zhes khas blangs long cig
12a7(rgyud 'grel): de dang mthun par sngar gsungs pa ltar khas blang bar bya'o// de nas dbang bskur ba'i gsol ba slob mas gdab pa ni rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// bdag 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bya bas ni// slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba// mi rtog 'khor lo sbyin par ldan// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs nas kyang / 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur te// skal pa chen po bdag la gsol// mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas gdab cing // dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba// 
12b2(rgyud 'grel): slob du pon chen po bdag la gsol// zhes gsol ba gdab pa'o// slob dpon gyis kyang dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gsol ba gdab pa ni/ che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin ni/ 
12b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal// zhes brjod do// de nas lA la gnang ba thob pa dang / snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM sarba yo ga bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pa da yA 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): mi/ sU ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho badz+ra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM zhes snying gar zla ba rdo rje bsams la/ lag pa nas khrid de/ dza hUM baMHho zhes bya ba sgo bzhi nas gzhug go// de nas shar gyi sgor phyogs par 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang yin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
12b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du yang 'grub pa thob nas dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig/ 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes brjod de/ de nas slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag gzhug par mdzad// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): de ma dag tu dral te gshegs// oM badz+rod ka tha hUM/ 'di de khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'grub// oM a mr-i
13a1(rgyud 'grel): tat+t+wa badz+ra a gar+b+ha hri prad+d+he/ de nas slob dpon gyis dam tshig bsgrags te/ deng nas brtsams te/ khyod kyi rdo rje slob dponang yin gyis/ nga yis 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): debyeng dgos so// khyod kyis ngal brnyas par ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar gyur ter/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' dbab par bya ste/ 'di skad brjod du 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): gzug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig pa'o// rdo rje dris bsgos pa snying gar 
13a4(rgyud 'grel): banag la/ 'di rdo rje'i dam tshig ste// 'jam dpal rdo rje yin par grags// rdo rje ye shes tha med ni// deng 'dir khyod la 'bab par shog/ oM many+dzu shrI badz+ra A bai sha ya a a ma ma zhes 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod do// rdo rje dmar po mtshan gang pachar ltar du 'bebs par bsam mo// gal te 'bab par ma gyur na sdig pa byang ba'i cho ga byas dbab par bya'o// de nas babs pa dang yi ge 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyapas brtan par bya'o// de nas me tog phreng ba dor te/ pra d+h+wetsA badz+ra ni zhes pas dkyil 'khor la gtor la gang du babs pa'i spyi de yi dam du dpogs so// i prA ti gr-ih+NA tI i mas ta ma thA ba la zhes bya bas 
13a7(rgyud 'grel): blong ba de mgol bcing bar bya'o// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te mig sngags kyu'i phyag rgyas dbye zhing sngags 'di brjod do// oM 'jam dpal rdo rje de khyod kyi// mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ 
13a8(rgyud 'grel): mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// de ring nyid du 'byed par shog/ hwe badz+ra pa sh+ya ng+ku zhes brjod la/ mig g.yogs kyang bkrol te 'di skad brjod do// legs par ltos 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): shig sems dpa' che// thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// me tog gang la phog pa ni// 'di de khyod kyi rigs kyi lha// rang gi lha ru shes par gyis// zhes brjod la rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams 
13b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i bar de dkyil 'khor drug bstan par b+hag// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar ris ma t+pal la pad+ma 'dra ba brgyad ces la/ yi dam lha'i gzugs 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): swa bsams la dbang bsrur bar bya ste/ de yang dang por re zhig chu'i dbang bskur bar bya ste/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar// de bzhin bdag gis 
13b4(rgyud 'grel): yi chu// dag pa yis ni sku khrus gsol// oM sarba ta thA gA tA badz+ra a b+hi She ka ta sa ma~M ya shri ye d+h+waM/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs nas sra// rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad dugasol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsid+d+ha badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hI/ rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'i// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi// zhe sdang chen po mi bskyod pas/ 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan chu yi dbang bskur ro// oM sarba ta thA gA ta badz+ra a b+hi Shany+tsi hU~M/ de nas cod pan gyi dbang bskur te// phal ba'i sa ni gnom pa dang // yon tan gzi brjid bskyed pa'i phyir// nga rgyal rin tshon 'byung 
13b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyis// cod pan gyi ni dbang bskur ro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta u mr-i ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ zhes brjod pa dang / dpal ldan rin chen cod pan dbang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// dreng bdag 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje rin chen mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa'i// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// nga rgyal rin chen 'byung 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyi// cod pan gyi ni dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje'i dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas kun gyis rdo rje'i dbang // di ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'di 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): ni khyod kyis long // oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ chos kyi gsung rab dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje gsung du 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ 'du shes phung po rnam dag pa'i// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas kyis// rdo rje yi ni dbang bskur ro// 
14a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur te// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i mchog tu bshad// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje las su mdzad du gsol/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha badz+ra 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba At+ma ko hi/ 'du byed phung po rnam dag pa'i// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// phrag dog don yod grub pa yi// dril bu yi ni dbang bskur ro// de nas ming gi dbang bskur te// srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung // sdug 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal chen po bsal ba'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// rnam par snang mdzad rtag tu bskyed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi che ge mo nA ma a b+hiSh+Te ka ta hUM/ dpal ldan rdo rje su 'chang ba// rdo rje mi 
14a8(rgyud 'grel): phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rdo rje sku ni mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa'i// chos kyi dbyings kyi 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis// gti mug rnam par snang mdzad kyi// dpal ldan mi bskyod dbang bskur ro// de dang ldan na de lnga ni rig pa'i dbang lnga ste/ phung po lnga dag nas nyon mongs pa lnga spangs nas/ ye shes lnga dang 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan te/ ma rig pa rig pas na rig pa'i dbang lnga zhes bya'o// de nas brtul shugs kyi dbang zhes bya ba ni/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang mi rtag 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): tu bcang // 'jam dpal rdo rje'i brdal shugs brtan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta many+dza shrI tsit+ta badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha a b+hi She ka ta ya mi hAM ha ha ha hi hi hi/ de nas phreng ba sbyin te/ sangs rgyas kun gyis mi byed pa'i/ 
14b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags bla na med pa yi// snying po yid bzhin nor bu 'di// skyob pa sngags kyi dbang bskur ro// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir/ yon bdag gis yon gyi mchog 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): phul la gsol ba btab la// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod stsol bgyis pa ltar// bdag kyang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
14b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba// 'gro ba bskyab pa'i gzi brjid can// ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas stsol// slob dpon chen po mi ldog pa'i// dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol// de ltar gsol ba btab rjes la sdom pa sbyin te/ ji bzhin don ldan dam tshig ni// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa kun// phas pham par ni rab tu 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): grags// spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya// srog gcod rku dang 'phrog pa dang // rdzun dang chang ni cung zad spang // mi dge ba ni bcu po dag/ khyod kyis nam yang ma spyod cig/ theg pa 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): dman la mos pa dang // sems can 'khor ba mi spang zhing // mya ngan 'das la ma chags shing // lha dang lha min mnyam mi bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya rnams// 'gom par bya ba ma
15a2(rgyud 'grel): yin te// dam tshig 'di dag nyams pa na// rdo rje dmyal bar 'tshed par byed// de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis// des kyang slob dpon gyi bka' bzhin bgyid par 'tshal lo zhes khas blangs so// de nas
15a3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dam pa de'i lus la lha bkod la/ rnam rgyal bum pa thogs te/ khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyis 
15a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a pa ya/ ba ra ti ga a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ de nas gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i mig zur thogs la/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): ling tog bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// oM badz+ra nai tra a pa ha ra ba Ta laM hri zhes nyon mongs pa spong ba'i dbang ngo // de nas me long bstan la/ 
15a6(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog ma med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung // ngo bo nyid med gnas med par// de ltar chos 'di/ 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): shes nas su// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye// ye shes kyi dbang ngo // de nas mda' gzhu blangs la mi'i drung du 'phen du bcug la/ thabs dang 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): shes rab gnyis med de// skal pa'i tshe 'phrul cir yang ston// bdud kyi rigs rnams pha ma byed pa'i// ye shes kyi ni mda' 'phongs shig ho zhes mda' 'jig rten gyi khams drug du 'phen du gzhug go// 
15b1(rgyud 'grel): sku'i dbang ngo // de nas dril bu blangs la dkrol te// chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// mkha' dang mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sku mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsol// 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): sa gsang gi dbang // de sang shA la yang rnam / mas la nag pa med// sa rgyas ca padag / rjes rgyu kA sa/ 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta a/ thugs kyi dbang ngo // de nas rkang pa'i bar du chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag/ lag par dung dang lce gtad/ mgo la gdugs gtad de/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo
15b4(rgyud 'grel): bskor cig/ di ring phan chad 'jig rten la// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// chos kyi dung ni bla med pas// kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis// som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing // dogs pa med pa'i 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis su// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ 'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la// phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang // kun tu 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod la srung bar byed ces brjod do// yang 'jig rten kun la thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes brjod do// de nas 
15b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gzengs bstod de// kun bdag sangs rgyas bsgom pa po// rdo rje'i ming dbang bskur bas kyang // de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan nyid// oM 'di de ngas khyod lung bstan yin// 'jam dpal
15b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// srid pa kun tu sgrub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton// kye de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhes bya ba/ sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hu r+N+Na ba swaH/ de nas gnang ba sbyin pa/ ngo bo nyid kyis 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar chags la sogs// gtsang mas sems can don bya'o// de nas dbugs dbyung ba/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor dam 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dir/ di ring phan chad khyed zhugs kyis// sdig pa kun las nges grol bar// khyed rnams des ni legs par gnas// bde chen thob pa 'di las ni// slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te// mi tshugs
16a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mi smod pa// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das// khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// de nyid the tsom med par 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): 'thob// de nas bdag nyid thar bsams la// chos gos bzung ste/ oM 'di ltar lung bstan par/ mgrin gcig tu ni rdzogs pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni lung bstan mdzad// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas// kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// rgyal ba'i bdag po ston pa yin// deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te// grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs// khyed
16a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// de nyid the tshom med par 'thob// de ltar gzengs bstod pa dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang / lung bstan pa'o// de nas slob ma de la batshed pa lnga dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa
16a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ khyed rnams kyis kyang dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa rnams yang dag par mchod cig par bka' bsgo'o// de nas de rnams kyis yo byad kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): lha mchod la/ lhag mas der tshogs tshim par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi lhal bstod de/ sgeg mo la sogs pa yis mchod la bstod do// de nas slob dpon la yon gyis mnyes par byas la/ 'dod 
16a9(rgyud 'grel): yang mamasam pas pa ba 'asam ca ma mam yang masam mam sa pams pa sa pa masas pa ma sas sa masam sas ma samamams ca sas sa sas mas mamasas ma samams mas mas sa mas mas mas mas sa samamamam mamasas sa thams sa mams mam mas mas 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don gsol ba gdab bo// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ste/ dkyil 'khor la skor ba byas la lha gshegs su gsol te/ dam tshig bsdus la ci bde ba'i spyod lam bya'o// slob ma rnams kyi don gyi 
16b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// dkyil 'khor cho ga byas pa la// dge ba bsags pa gang gyur pa// thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub shog/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshe 
16b3(rgyud 'grel): gnam mkha' dri ma med pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+ha dra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyag skad du/ Ar+ya man+ta shi nA ma sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen cing thugs su chud// smra ba'i skye sa mchog spo/ ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med// rnam kun mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// spyod dang ldan pa shes pa'o// 'jam pa'i mgon la dga' 
16b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // de yi don du sgrub pa'i thabs// mdo ru bsdus te bshad par bya// rnam par smin pa'i lus dgal// lha yi nga rgyal dran byas te// mdun du 'jam mgon bsams nas su// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang // 
16b7(rgyud 'grel): bshags dang rjes su yi rang ba// bsngo dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang // sems bskyed de ni yid kyis bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho hi/ brjod pas chos kun dmigs med par// stong pa nyid du bsgom 
16b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sems nyid a ru gyur nas su// zla dkyil d+hIHru bsgom par bya// de las 'phro 'dus mtshan mar gyur// man ma 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku// sku gser me tog zur phud can// shes rab ral gri 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): bo tis mtshan// zhi ba'i tshul 'chang gzhon nu bsgom// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings nas su/ e h+ye hi many+dzu shrI ku mA ra/ A kaR+Sha A be sha ya a a/ spyan drang mdun du bsam par bya/ 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa dbul byas te/ many+dzu shrI gan+d+he pU dza sA hA/ oM many+dza shrI puSh+pe pU dza sAhA/ oM many+dzu shI d+hU pe pU dza sA tAM/ oM many+dzu shI A lo ke pU dza swA hA/ oM many+dzu shrI nai bi d+yA pU dzA sA hA/ oM many+dzu 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): shrI gan+d+he swA hA/ de nas bstod pa'i tshig 'di brjod// shes rab chen po'i skad cig gis// chos kun khong du chud par mkhyen// mi shes g.yul ngo thams cad sel// sems can kun la byams thugs 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan// 'jam mgon byams thugs ldan la 'dud// mi shes g.yul sel ral gri dang // shes rab po ti thugs rtags can// chos rnams thams cad ston pa po// skye mched dbyings ston zug rngu spangs// 'jam 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): mgon chos sku nyid la bstod// yang na 'dod yon lnga sogs kyis// mngon par mchod nas bstod pa bya// yang na mtshan nyid bstod par bya// yon tan mtshan gyi bstod ce'o// de nas lus la bsdus byas nas// 
17a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa dag ni bya bar bshad// gnyis su med pa'i thugs ka ru// rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' bsam// de yi snying du ting 'dzin sems// nyi ma'i maN+Dal steng du ni// ral gri d+hIHyis mtshan par bsam/ 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): de la bzlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sha duHkha ts+tshe da/ pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ dz+nyA na ka ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maHswA hA/ mi bskyod pa'i sems kyis bzlas pa bya// skyo ba dag ni byang 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): ba na/ 'dzin pa med pa bsgom par bya// thun bzhi dag tu nyams su blang // med na nyin mtshan re re'o// tha mar gshegs su gsol ba bya// rang nyid lha'i nga rgyal gnas// 'jam mgon sgrub thabs legs
17b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bas// bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa// des ni khams gsum sems can kun// 'jam mgon go 'phang thob pa re shog/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): 2 kyi pa gapa tha gyi mas so/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi ma N+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bag chags skyon gyis dri ma'i tha ba la// shes rab bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs mdzad pa'i// a ra pa tsa 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): na la gus btud de// byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// de la 'dir dug gsum cha mnyam pa bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ bla ma gsang sngags
17b5(rgyud 'grel): la mkhas pa// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pas/ slob ma de skad cig smra ba de bzhin byed pa ma smin pa smin par bya ba'i phyir ri bo la sogs pa dgon pa'i gnas su maN+Dal byas te/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas 
17b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bshams nas/ bdag nyid drag po chen po drag shul che ba bdud la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed par bsams la/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdad de/ srid pa'i ri bo'i bgegs thams cad bcom la mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po'i ri bos bskor te/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs sprul te mchod pa chen po phul la bsam gtan chen po'i 
17b8(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ nam mkha'i khams su yi ge'i phreng ba snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas la/ mkhas pa byang sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas 'grub par bya ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba dang
18a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i byin brlabs las dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sprul pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / sku 'phrul chen po'i lha tshegs kyis don grub par bya ba'i phyir las rgyal ma tshig dang 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams bsgom par bya'o// de ltar lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor byar rung ba'i sa'i tshe ga dang / slob ma snod dang ldan pa la sdom pa phog la dkyil 'khor bris te rgyan rnams bkram ste/ lha dgod pa ni 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bcom ldan 'das byar sems rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu can/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'/ g.yas su rdo rje rin chen/ nub du rdo rje tshes/ byang du rdo rje las rnams bris/ 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang byams su bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa gzhag go/ dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): la skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma bcug la de la dbang bskur bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la yon gyi mchog blangs te lha dang slob dpon la mchod nas dkyil 'khor la bzod par gsol nas gshegs
18a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bsdus la ci bde bar gnas par bya'o// byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun// srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal nas// rdo rje sems 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' thob par shog/ byang sems rdo rje dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): Ar+ya many+dzu shI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pal phyag 'tshal lo// 
18a9(rgyud 'grel): ma ma sa mas ma mas la pa mam sa mas 'ams sas samasams pa la ma sa tha mas mas ma sa sa ma ma sa sas sa ma mas ca masapa mas sa mas pamams ma pa sa sa sa sams sa thamamams sa ma mas mamamam mam mas ma sa 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nur su sprul me tog thod// sku mdog gser can shes rab ye shes lha// mi shes rgyud gcod ral gri 'dzin// shes drug ye shes phyag 'tshal te// 'jam dpal rang bzhin chos sku ni// 
18b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa la// gdul bya'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor drug/ bde gshegs rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad/ de la 'dir sems can gyi gti mug 'dul ba'i gnyen por bcom ldan 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs pa yin te/ de yang gza' skar bzang po la bsnyen pa'i khang pa bkra shis par 'jug par bya ste/ dpal ldan 'byor pa phun sum tshogs 
18b4(rgyud 'grel): bar byas la/ sgrub pa'i gnas de yang byi dor legs par byas te spos bzang po yang phyogs bzhir gtul nas maN+Dal la tshul dang mthun pa'i me tog bkod de mchod pa bkram nas bde bar gshegs 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku gzugs rnams kyang bkram la stan 'bol ba'i steng du sems can la phan pa'i blos 'dug ste/ ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed po ni skad cig gis rdzogs par byas la/ khro bo 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): gdong drug pa phyag bcu gnyis pa/ 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / mda' dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / g.yas pa'i phyag na thogs pa'o// thod pa dang / sdigs mdzub dang 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa dang / gzhu dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / dbyug to rnams g.yon du thogs pa'o// spyan dmar ba bco brgyad sdang mig dgrad pa/ ljags drug glog ltar 'gyur ba'i zhal nas hUM hUM hUM sgrogs pa/ zhabs drug 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): gis 'gro ba rigs drug brdzis pa/ char sprin gyi mdog lta bur bsams la bgegs thams cad bskrad la ji ltar 'dod pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo bya'o// de nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par byas la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o// gzhi'i sangs rgyas a las rnam snang dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya/ de'i thugs 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): kar dang po'i sangs rgyas/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo'i rtsib sa bcu gnyis pa a sa mtshan pa/ de'i steng du a las bcom ldan 'das shes rab ye shes dkar po g.yon 'khor lo g.yas 
19a3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri/ thugs kar a las zla ba'i steng na a/ sangs rgyas de'i thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams spro bar bzhed pas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a A sarba ta 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): thA ga tahr-i da ya/ tA ra ta ra/ oM hUM d+hIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mA rti/ bA gI shA ra ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harma ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmad+hA du dz+nyA na gAr+b+ha AHzhes brjod pas/ de 'phros shing 'dus pa las lha 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gnas su yi ge a sha stag tu gyur to// a de las rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go/ de'i rjes la mtshan brjod cing bstod de sprul pa'i sku dpag tu 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): med pas gti mug gi gnas sbyangs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa ni las rgyal mchog go/ de lta bu'i bsnyen pa byas nas dkyil 'khor brtsams nas legs par bris nas dgod pa ni dbus su rnam par snang 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ shar du sems ma rdo rje/ lho ru rin chen sems ma/ nub du pad+ma sems ma/ byang du las kyi sems ma'o// gru chad la sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'o// 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): khyams kyi grur ni bdug pa ma la sogs pa bzhi'o// de nyid du bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yang tshul dang mthun pa dgod do// sgo bzhir ni sgo ma bzhi bzhag go/ de lta bu'i dkyil 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mdzes pa bris te/ sems can skal pa can dag kyang der zhugs par byas la dbang bskur ba thob pa rang slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha la yang ci 'byor pa'i yon phul la slob dpon gyis kyang 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung ba dang / gzengs bstod de lung bstan par bya'o// bde bar gshegs mchog dam pa ni/ gti mug rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa yi// shes 
19b3(rgyud 'grel): pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub shog/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ rnam par snang mdzad dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so//

20a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang bcas pa spyan drang zhing mnyes par byas la/ de'i mdun du sdig pa'i dri ma bkru ba la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed do// de nas sdom pa ma lus pa bzung ba stong zhing 
20a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa la mos shing khang pa yang gzhal zhing brjod du med pa las ye shes kyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa las grub pa'i nang du gzhi'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' snying
20a3(rgyud 'grel): kar rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba dang po dang rigs mthun pa'i sems dpa' thams cad dang / a las byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'khor du bltas te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa rnams dkyil

21a1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas nges par hrIHlas byung ba'i sbyor ba ye shes sems dpa'i bar du rdzogs pa dang / de'i byin brlabs kyis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba rang gi
